name: Humbug Loop
description:
A looping infinity scarf combining twisting braids on one side and classic stripes on the other. Wrap it around twice or leave it to drape down. Made from luxurious merino wool with a touch of mohair in charcoal and light-grey.

Dimensions: 23cm wide by 148cm circumference. 

Materials: 80% merino wool. 20% mohair.

Wash care: Hand wash only. Dry flat. Cool iron

All cari + carl products are hand crafted to order. The scarf will be dispatched within 15 working days of payment being received. If a shorter timescale is required please email via the contact page.

name: Interweave Shawl
description:
A huge enveloping shawl made from luxurious merino wool with a touch of mohair. Available this season in charcoal and light grey for a classic winter shawl. Wrap it three times around the neck and shoulders to create a super warm cocoon or drape it long down the body so the striking pattern stands out. 

Dimensions: 187cm x 40cm.

Materials: 80% merino wool. 20% mohair.

Wash care: Hand wash only. Dry flat. Cool iron

All cari + carl products are hand crafted to order. The shawl will be dispatched within 15 working days of payment being received. If a shorter timescale is required please email via the contact page.

name: Knotty Scarf
description:
A long narrow scarf of repeating granny knots in charcoal and light grey. Despite the narrow width, the luxurious merino wool and mohair create a lovely warm scarf. Wrap it around repeatedly for a chunky, knotty neck warmer. 

Dimensions: 190cm x 40cm.

Materials: 80% merino wool. 20% mohair.

Wash care: Hand wash only. Dry flat. Cool iron

All cari + carl products are hand crafted to order. The scarf will be dispatched within 15 working days of payment being received. If a shorter timescale is required please email via the contact page.

name: Knot Net Shawl
description:
A net of granny knots creates a striking structural pattern, resulting in a chunky winter shawl. Made from luxurious merino wool with a touch of mohair in charcoal and light-grey.

Dimensions: 200cm x 25cm.

Materials: 80% merino wool. 20% mohair.

Wash care: Hand wash only. Dry flat. Cool iron

All cari + carl products are hand crafted to order. The scarf will be dispatched within 15 working days of payment being received. If a shorter timescale is required please email via the contact page.

name: Scroll Scarf
description:
A scarf with a striking cable-like scrolling pattern of charcoal and light grey strips moving under and over one another. Luxurious merino wool with a touch of mohair creates a very warm scarf.  

Dimensions: 220cm long by 24cm wide approx. 

Materials: 80% merino wool. 20% mohair.

Wash care: Hand wash only. Dry flat. Cool iron

All cari + carl products are hand crafted to order. The scarf will be dispatched within 15 working days of payment being received. If a shorter timescale is required please email via the contact page.
